title: 有馬記念の後に・敗北後の腹ごなし

text_block_list.text: Matikanetannhauser, who lost to Nice Nature in the 'Arima Kinen'. After the race, the two headed to—
A ramen shop. Recalling the race, Matikanetannhauser groans at Nice Nature's growth.
Determined to do better in the next race, she slurps her noodles and prepares for the next battle.
